attributes.action: Bring home all British troops from Afganistan immediately.
attributes.additional_details: Due to the increasing incidents of soldiers being killed by the very people they are supposed to be there to protect, it is our wish to see all of our troops involved in operations in Afganistan to be withdrawn and brought home with immediate effect.

rejection.details: The e-petition that already exists is titled "Pull out of Afghanistan immediately to halt further troop injuries and deaths".
